if dbo.Sthink$Function$CheckSQLInjection(@stt_rec) = 0 return &GLTranReportSql; else begin declare @m_ma_nt0 varchar(10), @key varchar(128), @l char(1), @formTypeIRS tinyint if @@form = '520' or @@form = '020' select @l = 'V', @formTypeIRS = 1 else select @l = @@language, @formTypeIRS = 0 select @m_ma_nt0 = val from options where name = N'm_ma_nt0' &IRTranSqlIf;
begin declare @tk_vt varchar(128), @h_line1 as nvarchar(128), @h_line2 as nvarchar(128), @h_line3 as nvarchar(128), @h_line4 as nvarchar(128) select @tk_vt = '' select @tk_vt = @tk_vt + rtrim(a.tk_vt) + ', ' from (select distinct tk_vt from d71$$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec) a select @tk_vt = left(@tk_vt, len(@tk_vt) - 1)
select @h_line1 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC013' select @h_line2 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC014' select @h_line3 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC015' select @h_line4 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC016'
select case when a.ong_ba <> '' then a.ong_ba else case when @l = 'V' then d.ten_kh else d.ten_kh2 end end as ong_ba , case when a.ong_ba <> '' then a.ong_ba else d.ten_kh2 end as ong_ba2 , b.ma_kho, isnull(c.dia_chi,'') dia_diem, ltrim(a.so_ct) so_ct, a.t_tien, a.t_tien_nt , dbo.Sthink$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, @l) t_tien_in_word , dbo.Sthink$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, @l) t_tien_nt_in_word , case when @formTypeIRS = 1 then dbo.Sthink$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, 'E') else '' end t_tien_in_word2 , case when @formTypeIRS = 1 then dbo.Sthink$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, 'E') else '' end t_tien_nt_in_word2 , replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam , @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4 , @tk_vt as tk_no, a.tk as tk_co, isnull(e.so_ct_goc, 0) as so_ct_goc, isnull(e.dien_giai_ct_goc, '') as dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_ct from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join d71$$partition$current b with(nolock) on (a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and b.stt_rec0 = (select min(stt_rec0) from d71$$partition$current with(nolock) where stt_rec = a.stt_rec)) left join dmkho c with(nolock) on b.ma_kho = c.ma_kho left join dmkh d with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = d.ma_kh left join v00$$partition$current e on a.stt_rec = e.stt_rec where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec
select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintIRTran @@language, @key, 'd71$$partition$current', @@id, @formTypeIRS end else begin select @h_line1 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC013' select @h_line2 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC014' select @h_line3 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC015' select @h_line4 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC016'
select a.ong_ba, rtrim(a.ma_kh) as ma_kh, b.ten_kh, b.ten_kh2, b.dia_chi, ltrim(a.so_ct) so_ct, ltrim(a.so_ct0) so_ct0 , convert(varchar,a.ngay_ct0, 103) as ngay_ct0, ltrim(a.tk) tk, isnull(c.ten_tk,'') ten_tk, isnull(c.ten_tk2,'') ten_tk2 , a.t_tien0, a.t_tien_nt0, a.t_cp, a.t_cp_nt, a.t_thue, a.t_thue_nt, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt , dbo.Sthink$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0,a.t_tt, @l) as t_tien_in_word , dbo.Sthink$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @l) as t_tien_nt_in_word , case when @formTypeIRS = 1 then dbo.Sthink$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'E') else '' end t_tien_in_word2 , case when @formTypeIRS = 1 then dbo.Sthink$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'E') else '' end t_tien_nt_in_word2 , replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam , @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4 from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh left join dmtk c with(nolock) on a.tk = c.tk where stt_rec = @stt_rec
select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintPVTran @@language, @key, 'd71$$partition$current', @@id, @formTypeIRS end end
